텍스트: From my perspective, I prefer to study subjects that interest them. That's because I think that it is important to find a job that is suitable for my interests. Moreover, if I have my favorite job, I don't have to be stressed out about my work. Furthermore, I can get a motivation to be better my tasks in corporate. So, it'll be easier to get a promotion, and I can produce better results.
